participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about music, Emily is optimistic and loves to connect with others through her art.
participant_1.background: Mom in telecommunications. I am a student living at home while pursuing my music industry degree. Both my parents are creative. I dream of playing music for a living. My dad works in the automotive industry.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and sociable, Jake enjoys meeting new people and is determined to succeed in his career in medicine.
participant_2.background: I cannot wait to start my new life. I hope to become a doctor one day. I make a living by waiting tables. Until then, I will make $215 an hour.

content.text: Not much, just getting ready for my day.
Oh, what do you do for a living?
Oh, that's cool! I'm a waitress, but I'm hoping to go to medical school one day.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll make a great doctor.
So, what's your favorite thing about being a waitress?
I like the interaction with the customers, and I also like making people happy.
That's great! I can imagine that's a really rewarding job.
It is. I love making people's day a little brighter.
What's your favorite thing about studying music?
I love the creative process, and I love being able to share my music with others.
That's great! I can't wait to hear you play sometime.
Thanks! I'm always looking for new people to play with.
Awesome! We should definitely get together sometime.
Sounds good! I'll bring my guitar.
